title: 820-3787 ram error
message: This board mostly work ok but sometimes reboot and CMD+D shows ram eror. No solution for it?

title: 820-3787 ram error
message: Yes, replace the RAM and hope there is no broken traces under the CPU. I would advise to not waste time on this one.

title: 820-3787 ram error
message:
Of course, will not replace 32 rams...
Reflow will solution. Worth to try?

title: 820-3787 ram error
message: You can try but mostly a waste of time and high chance of a completely dead board afterwards and customer complaints from that.
